metadata.title: CVE-2022-33196 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect default permissions in some memory controller configurations forsome Intel(R) Xeon(R) Processors when using Intel(R) Software GuardExtensions which may allow a privileged user to potentially enableescalation of privilege via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
